startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Array of URLs to start the discovery process from. APX will visit these URLs and discover any APIs they use. Tip: Use web pages (not direct API endpoints) for best results.

apiPatterns.title: API URL Patterns (Advanced)
apiPatterns.description: Optional: Filter specific API endpoints by URL pattern. Examples: ['/api/', '/v1/data']. Leave empty to auto-detect all JSON responses.

minResponseSize.title: Minimum Response Size (bytes)
minResponseSize.description: Filter out small responses (like config files). Default: 1000 bytes. Increase to focus on larger data APIs.

discoveryTimeout.title: Discovery Timeout (ms)
discoveryTimeout.description: How long to wait for API discovery on each page. Default: 10 seconds. Increase for slower sites.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of API pages to process. Default: 100. Increase to get more data, decrease for faster runs.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Number of API requests to make simultaneously. Default: 5. Increase for speed (but may hit rate limits).

dataPath.title: Data Path
dataPath.description: JSONPath to extract data items from API response (e.g., 'data.items', 'results'). If empty, will auto-detect

generateDocumentation.title: Generate API Documentation
generateDocumentation.description: Automatically generate API documentation in multiple formats (OpenAPI, Postman, cURL, Insomnia)

exportFormats.title: Export Formats
exportFormats.description: Formats to export API documentation (openapi, postman, curl, insomnia)

enableInteractionSimulation.title: Enable Interaction Simulation
enableInteractionSimulation.description: Automatically scroll and click elements to trigger APIs on landing pages (default: true)

interactionWaitTime.title: Interaction Wait Time (ms)
interactionWaitTime.description: Time to wait after each interaction in milliseconds (default: 2000)

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: API key for authentication (will be added as X-API-Key header)

bearerToken.title: Bearer Token
bearerToken.description: Bearer token for authentication (will be added as Authorization: Bearer TOKEN header)

loginUrl.title: Login URL (OAuth Flow)
loginUrl.description: URL for OAuth 2.0 login flow. APX will navigate to this URL and capture authentication tokens automatically

oauthFlow.title: Enable OAuth Flow
oauthFlow.description: Enable automatic OAuth 2.0 token capture from login flow (requires loginUrl)

generateGitHubActions.title: Generate GitHub Actions
generateGitHubActions.description: Generate GitHub Actions workflow for automated API discovery

generateSecurityReport.title: Generate Security Audit Report
generateSecurityReport.description: Generate security audit report for discovered APIs

generateEnhancedDocs.title: Generate Enhanced Documentation
generateEnhancedDocs.description: Generate markdown documentation with JSDoc comments

enableGitIntegration.title: Enable Git Integration
enableGitIntegration.description: Automatically commit generated files to git (requires git repository)

generateMockServer.title: Generate Mock Server
generateMockServer.description: Auto-generate production-ready mock server from discovered APIs (Express.js/Fastify). Uses real API response data.

generatePerformanceBenchmark.title: Generate Performance Benchmark
generatePerformanceBenchmark.description: Benchmark all API endpoints and generate performance reports with k6/Artillery load test scripts.

generateContractTests.title: Generate Contract Tests
generateContractTests.description: Generate contract tests (Pact, Schemathesis) to prevent breaking changes. Includes CI/CD integration.

generateMCPIntegration.title: Generate MCP Integration
generateMCPIntegration.description: Generate Model Context Protocol (MCP) integration for AI assistant compatibility. Enables AI models to discover and interact with APIs.

generateX402Integration.title: Generate x402 Protocol Integration
generateX402Integration.description: Detect and handle x402 payment-required API endpoints. Auto-generates payment handling code.

generateDependencyGraph.title: Generate Dependency Graph
generateDependencyGraph.description: Create visual dependency graph showing API relationships, critical paths, and bottlenecks. Generates interactive HTML and Mermaid diagrams.
